description:
Serval and Caracal find a "human" child in the forest. As they travel with the child, they meet new Friends, uncover the secrets of Japari Park, and become involved in an event that will "shake the earth."

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Educational
tags.description: Primary aim is to educate the audience.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

node.description:
[Website](https://highkick.jp/tateyama)

He is a drummer for the Japanese rock band THE LINDA!, which was formed in 2002 when its members were enrolled at Rikkyo University.

Date of Birth: March 7, 1977 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/masumoto_takuya) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/masum0t0) Takuya Masumoto is a scriptwriter and narrator from Osaka Prefecture, Japan.

Website | Twitter Introduction Masayoshi Ooishi is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, arranger and guitarist. He is currently a lead vocalist and guitarist for the band Sound Schedule, which is a three-piece J-pop/rock/jazz band. He is also a part of the duo [OxT](https://anilist.co/staff/127401/OxT) (Ooishi x Tom-H@ck), with Oshima Tomohiro. Biography Since making his major debut as a vocalist and guitarist for the band Sound Schedule in 2001, he has left numerous works as a musician. His outstanding voice, which has revealed itself to be capable of touching the hearts of many, worldwide, and while having his performance evaluated by the people, as a part of a new band at the time, he got to appear on music-themed programs on TV, and on numerous unusual music stations, while also participating in festivals nationwide. In 2008, he made his solo debut as "Masayoshi Ooishi". His way of playing the acoustic guitar was said to be a masterpiece of its own, and as a solo artist to debut with that as a reputation, it made it all the more interesting for him. There are various ways to describe him as a musician, some call him a "hand magician", or a "one-person amusement park", some even say it's like watching a magic trick. Not only does he perform live at the country's floorboard, he also performs on the internet on sites such as YouTube and Nico Nico Douga, where he attracts lots of attention from all generations alike, but he's a lot more popular with the younger generation.

[Website](https://jin-jin-suruyo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jin_jin_suruyo)

 Jin, also known as Shizen no Teki-P is a sound producer, composer, and arranger from Japan He was influenced by his keyboardist uncle and started learning keyboard at the age of 6. He has also been influenced by bands such as THE BACK HORN and composers such as Satoru Kosaki.  He is a relatively new producer, having only been active since early 2011, but is quickly becoming well known. On September 30, 2011, Jin submitted the song “Kagerou Days” (カゲロウデイズ) to Nico Nico Douga. The song quickly gained popularity and has since been viewed more than 3,000,000 times.

[Website](https://jin-jin-suruyo.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/jin_jin_suruyo)

[Website](https://halyosy.com) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/halyosy) | [Nico Nico Douga](https://www.nicovideo.jp/user/1101042/mylist?ref=pc_userpage_menu) [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/haly/) | [Piapro](https://piapro.jp/halyosy) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/halyosy) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/halyosy)

halyosy, real name Haruyoshi Mori, is a singer-songwriter, and a former member of the defunct professional music group "absorb" (halyosy, that, and is). As a VOCALOID producer, he has created a number of songs mainly using the Crypton VOCALOIDs.

Rapbit, or Rapbito, is a rap artist who became popular on Nico Nico Douga and YouTube for doing covers of game and anime songs, and self composed songs.  He major debut on beginning 2009 with album All Day, All Night, and had second album called RAP MUSIC on March 11, 2009.  He loves reading manga.  He got married on January 18, 2011.

[Website](https://gclk.jp)

Gothic x Luck is a two-member unit with the bird-of-paradise as a motif in the Kemono Friends universe. The members are [Mashiro Yagi](https://anilist.co/staff/151272/) and [Madoka Kan](https://anilist.co/staff/151271/).
PPP is a seiyuu collaboration for the anime Kemono Friends.
